document_data.mainbody:
Finderlig was a duergar trader in the Underdark and a companion of both Carlig and Uder Mordin.
Finderlig considered himself a realistic and busy duergar. He believed that outsiders only caused problems, and informed Gorions Ward that many others in the Underdark shared his beliefs. He did, however, wish Gorions Ward and his party the best of luck in their journeys.
